articles.description: An animated spin-off of the Game of Thrones series is in 'the very early development stages at HBO Max' as confirmed by multiple sources to Variety on Wednesday.

articles.author: Lynn Elber, AP Television Writer
articles.title: Cloris Leachman dead at 94; Actress known for work on 'Mary Tyler Moore Show', 'Phyllis' - KABC-TV
articles.description: Actress Cloris Leachman has died, her publicist has confirmed. She was 94. Leachman was known for her work on "The Mary Tyler Moore Show" and its spinoff "Phyllis." She died Wednesday of natural causes at her home in Encinitas, California.
